name: Inferno: Deathfield
description: After a long time in exile, Lucifer, the King of the Underworld rages again to conquer the Hell. The demons emerge through the door of death and a chosen warrior is destined to seal it once for all and save the mankind from a total abolishment. Be the chosen warrior and save the world!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel i5-4590 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GTX 970 Storage: 4 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel Core i7-3770K Memory: 12 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1060 Storage: 4 GB available space
